front.title: Framework and roadmap for smart grid interoperability standards regional roundtables summary report

author.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.).

front.abstract: From September to November 2018, the National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST) partnered with the National Association of Regulatory Utility Commissioners (NARUC) to hold a series of roundtable meetings to support the revision of its Framework and Roadmap for Smart Grid Interoperability Standards (hereafter the Framework). The Framework addresses the increasingly important ability to exchange actionable information between devices and organizations.
